%!TeX jobNames = job-1, job-2
%!TeX job-2:outputDirectory = output
%!TeX tests = bibtex -version
\documentclass{article}

\usepackage{autind,bibref}

\newindex{aut}{adx}{and}{Name Index}

\begin{document}
  \adjustcitation\cite
  \nocite*
  foo, wibble, wibble \cite{Angle:2003}, gronk.
  \bibliographystyle{xplain}
  \bibliography{foo}
  \printindex[aut]
\end{document}
